skills.name: Escort Ship (护航使者)
skills.text: 1. During battle, the first enemy attack of type (Main Battery, Airstrike, Torpedo) has a 100% chance to instantly reload 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge.

skills.name: Relentless Bombardment (奋进炮击)
skills.text:
1. During [Main Battery Salvo], increases chance of [Cut-in] by 20%.
2. [Cut-in] damage increased by 50%.

skills.name: Marked by Torpedo (鱼雷烙印)
skills.text:
During battle, Savage's [Torpedo Salvo] will prioritse target with the highest current HP.
On [Torpedo Salvo] hit, the target will be marked. The next [Main Battery Salvo] of the fleet will be 90% more likely to hit the same target.
